response.job_title: Electronic engineer with experience in networks support and management, knowledge in courses of Cisco CCNA.
response.summary: Electronic engineer. Network support and management, knowledge in courses of Cisco CCNA, Fortinet NSE I and II, SDWAN in Fortinet and Cisco Viptela. Disposition for learning and teaching, commitment, and motivation for self-improvement. ES/EN/DE.
response.skills: Telecomunicaciones, Cisco Networking, Electronic Engineering, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Servicio de atención al cliente, Dirección, Networking, Trabajo en equipo, Comunicación, Liderazgo, Red de área local, Fortinet, Asistencia para hardware TI, Direccionamiento IP, Cisco Call Manager, Juniper Networks, Tecnología de Cisco, Redes MPLS

profile_positions.description: Remote support for special customers in Claro Colombia MPLS, WAN monitoring, Troubleshooting, CUCM management, IP addressing, IP dynamic and static routing, preparation of reports, topologies design, customer service, device management of routers and switches Cisco, Fortinet, Alcatel, Huawei, ZTE and Juniper.
profile_positions.title: Connectivity Engineer

profile_positions.description: LAN support and management (physically and through line commands), structured cabling networks, IP addressing, host configuration, Ofiice pack support, PC maintenance, biometric management, CCTV, communication using English language.
profile_positions.title: IT Analyst

profile_positions.description: LAN support and management, projects support, structured cabling networks, IP addressing, host configuration, Ofiice pack support, PC maintenance and CCTV.
profile_positions.title: Network Support Engineer

company.name: Porsche Colombia S.A.S
company.description:
Porsche Colombia S.A.S es el importador oficial de las marcas del sector automotor Volkswagen, Audi, SEAT, ​​CUPRA, Škoda y Volkswagen Camiones y Buses, en Colombia.


Empresa certificada en ISO 9001 por TÜV SÜD.
